result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 11:03 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo not in court. Includes 21CM305 and 22CM2. Set for STC. ADA Ballo requests body only warrant statewide on both matters; so ordered.  gll
Signed by RMW on 8/2/22. c: SCSO

10:33 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo not in court.  Attorney Travis Satorius in court for Sarah Marie Garofalo. Set for a PH.  Court reviews file and notes prior non appearance and warrant. Court orders WARRANT - BODY ONLY. Extraditable, Adjoining States.

ADDRESS INFO for Sarah Marie Garofalo
Current: 7430 Boyd Ave, Inver Grove Heights, MN 55076 United States  (Effective: 01-03-2022)
Prior: 1865 Donegal Drive, #2, Woodbury, MN 55125

1:23 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Sarah Marie Garofalo for today. Includes 22CM188 INIT, 22CM2 RW, 21CM305 RW, and 22CF229 RW. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights in 22CM188. Defendant understands. Waive reading. NG plea in 22CM188. DE confirms address and DOB. Court QUASHES WARRANTS. Court questions non-appearance. DE state she had COVID and sent fax, but states second page wasn't rec'd. Bond argument; bond ordered in 22CM188. Court reinstates bond in 22CM2, 21CM305, and 22CF229. Adjourned at 1:34 PM.  gll
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Settlement conference scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Per SRN. Fax: SCSO, Dispatch, Jail.  gll
Preliminary hearing on August 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Adjoining States. Signed by RMW on 04/19/22. arc   c: SCSO with complaint. e: DA and Atty Dolfi.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 22CF229 (PH), 22CM2 & 21CM305 (STC):
CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Bela Alexander Ballo   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Sarah Marie Garofalo did not appear. Case called at 9:07 a.m. Court notes 22CF229 is scheduled for a preliminary hearing. DE does not appear. Court did receive a fax around midnight requesting to reschedule. Reviewed other files and same issue in February. ADA Ballo requesting warrant. Atty Dolfi requesting warrant be stayed. Court will issue warrant. Court adjourned at 9:10 a.m.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on April 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.
